thread.title: TV special to honor Mickey Mouse, other animated stars - The Star

author: Source: The Star
title: TV special to honor Mickey Mouse, other animated stars - The Star
text:
In this photo provided by FOX, Marge, right, promises to make Halloween fun for Bart, left, in the all-new "Halloween Horror” episode of "The Simpsons," that aired Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015, on FOX. Mickey Mouse, Bart Simpson and Scooby-Doo will share the limelight in a TV special paying tribute to cartoon characters.
 The Star.
